languages.text: "Завари мне рекафа и протри после себя капитанский трон — я скоро буду".
"Brew me some recaf and wipe down the captain's throne after you vacate it — I will be there shortly."
languages.original_text: "Завари мне рекафа и протри после себя капитанский трон — я скоро буду".

traits.locale_text: "Brew me some recaf and wipe the captain's throne after yourself — I will be there shortly."
"Brew me some recaf and wipe the captain's throne after yourself — I will be there shortly."
"Brew me some recaf and wipe down the captain's throne after you vacate it — I will be there shortly."
"Brew me some recaf and wipe down the captain's throne after you vacate it — I will be there shortly."
"Brew me some recaf and wipe down the captain's throne after you vacate it — I will be there shortly."
"Brew me some recaf and wipe down the captain's throne after you vacate it — I will be there shortly."

languages.text: «Prepárame un café y límpiame el trono del capitán cuando lo abandones; no tardaré en llegar».
languages.original_text: "Brew me some recaf and wipe down the captain's throne after you vacate it — I will be there shortly."

traits.locale_text: «Prepárame un café y límpiame el trono del capitán cuando lo abandones; no tardaré en llegar».

languages.text: “给我煮点雷卡咖啡，然后把你的舰长宝座清理一下，擦干净，我马上就到。”
languages.original_text: "Brew me some recaf and wipe down the captain's throne after you vacate it — I will be there shortly."

traits.locale_text: “给我煮点雷卡咖啡，然后把你的舰长宝座清理一下，擦干净，我马上就到。”

languages.text: « Préparez-moi un bon recaff et astiquez le trône du capitaine après l'avoir libéré, j'arrive. »
languages.original_text: "Brew me some recaf and wipe down the captain's throne after you vacate it — I will be there shortly."

traits.locale_text: « Préparez-moi un bon recaff et astiquez le trône du capitaine après l'avoir libéré, j'arrive. »

languages.text: 「君がそれを立ち退けたら、{mf|俺|私}に模造コーヒーを入れて、キャプテンの王座を掃除してくれ―{mf|俺|私}は間もなくそこに着く」
languages.original_text: "Brew me some recaf and wipe down the captain's throne after you vacate it — I will be there shortly."

traits.locale_text: 「君がそれを立ち退けたら、{mf|俺|私}に模造コーヒーを入れて、キャプテンの王座を掃除してくれ―{mf|俺|私}は間もなくそこに着く」

languages.text: "Bana kahfe yap ve kalktıktan sonra oturduğun o tahtı bir güzel siliver. Birazdan orada olacağım."
languages.original_text: "Brew me some recaf and wipe down the captain's throne after you vacate it — I will be there shortly."

traits.locale_text: "Bana kahfe yap ve kalktıktan sonra oturduğun o tahtı bir güzel siliver. Birazdan orada olacağım."

languages.text: "Kocht mir einen Rekaf und wischt Euren Thron ab, nachdem Ihr ihn geräumt habt ... ich bin gleich da."
languages.original_text: "Brew me some recaf and wipe down the captain's throne after you vacate it — I will be there shortly."

traits.locale_text: "Kocht mir einen Rekaf und wischt Euren Thron ab, nachdem Ihr ihn geräumt habt ... ich bin gleich da."
